name: Pappets
description:
[ESP] Pappets es un juego de plataformas 2D en el que manejas a una marioneta totalmente personalizable, accionando sus articulaciones como si tirases de hilos.

Actualmente en desarrollo.

-

[ENG] Pappets is a 2D platform video game in which you handle a fully customizable puppet, activating its joints as if you were pulling the threads. 

 Currently in development.
